function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate context parameters related to citizens' distribution in the city","Impact":"Misrepresentation of occupation model, leading to inaccurate predictions and planning","Mitigation":"Verify and validate context parameters using real-time data and citizen feedback","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, IoT sensors, citizen-tracking apps","People":"City planners, urban designers, policymakers","Owner":"City government, data analysts"},{"Description":"Dependence on OpenStreetMap (OSM) data for context parameters","Impact":"Potential inaccuracies in OSM data affecting the accuracy of occupation model","Mitigation":"Use multiple data sources for cross-validation, conduct field surveys to validate OSM data","Technologies":"GIS software, data integration tools, surveying equipment","People":"Data analysts, GIS specialists, survey teams","Owner":"City government, data analysts"},{"Description":"Insufficient consideration of temporal characteristics in context parameters","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions of occupation based on citizen routines and temporal factors","Mitigation":"Collect and analyze historical and real-time data on citizen movement and routines, incorporate machine learning models for predictive analysis","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, machine learning algorithms, IoT sensors","People":"Data scientists, urban researchers, city planners","Owner":"City government, data analysts"}]}
